body: I'm not into yaoi, but the cover art drew me in and holy shit this thing is fucking art this belongs in a museum for Christ's sake, holy shit

i made an account just to say this shit is mf art. i just love the art so much. the darkness, the crisp ass lines. The COVER ART? *chefs kiss* this author is seriously talented. If they made an original series i would for sure read it.
